bug.author: aclifton314
bug.summary: StopIteration Error when running wandb sync with wandb local
bug.description:
System Info
Python: 3.7.6 wandb: 0.9.7
I'm getting the following error when running wandb sync from wandb local: user@pop-os:$ wandb sync dryrun-20201013_132838-2w22dip2/ wandb: Syncing dryrun-20201013_132838-2w22dip2/ to: wandb: dark-serenity-2 http://localhost:8080/user/huggingface/runs/3rqkmquu wandb: Uploading history metrics Traceback (most recent call last): File "/path/to/anaconda3/bin/wandb", line 8, in <module> sys.exit(cli()) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 764, in __call__ return self.main(*args, **kwargs) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 717, in main rv = self.invoke(ctx) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx)) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 956, in invoke return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 555, in invoke return callback(*args, **kwargs) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/decorators.py", line 17, in new_func return f(get_current_context(), *args, **kwargs) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/cli.py", line 156, in wrapper return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/cli.py", line 447, in sync path, run_id=id, project=project, entity=entity, ignore_globs=globs) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/wandb_run.py", line 347, in from_directory file_api.stream_file(history) File "/path/to/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/apis/file_stream.py", line 255, in stream_file first_line = next(f) StopIteration Here are the commands I issued: <denchmark-code>user@pop-os:$ wandb local wandb: A new version of W&B local is available, upgrade by calling `wandb local --upgrade` wandb: W&B local started at http://localhost:8080 üöÄ wandb: You can stop the server by running `docker stop wandb-local` user@pop-os:$ wandb sync dryrun-20201013_132838-2w22dip2/
</denchmark-code>
Any thoughts about how to resolve this error?

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.96. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

The issue was because not enough iterations had happened to log anything. I am using the huggingface integration. I let my training run for longer and everything is now showing up in wandb. Closing this issue!
